name: mikroe.click.rn4678
short_description: RN4678 click carries the RN4678 Bluetooth® 4.2 dual mode module from Microchip. The click is designed to run on a 3.3V power supply. It communicates with the target microcontroller over I2C and UART interface, with additional functionality provided by the following pins on the mikroBUS™ line: AN, RST, CS, PWM, INT.
